00053             {
00054                   try
00055                   {
00056                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00057                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00058                   }
00059                   catch( Exception $e )
00060                   {
00061                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00091             function                process_eq( $Str , $Changed )
00092             {
00093                   try
00094                   {
00095                         $Limitations = array( 'value1' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'value2' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00096                         
00097                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'eq' , $Limitations ) ; )
00098                         {
00099                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00100                               
00101                               list( $Val1 , $Val2 ) = $this->BlockSettings->get_settings( 'value1,value2' );
00102                               
00103                               $Str = str_replace( "{eq:$Parameters}" , $Val1 == $Val2 ? 1 : 0 , $Str );
00104                               
00105                               $Changed = true;
00106                         }
00107                         
00108                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00109                   }
00110                   catch( Exception $e )
00111                   {
00112                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00113                   }
00114             }

00397             function                process_odd( $Str , $Changed )
00398             {
00399                   try
00400                   {
00401                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'odd' ) ; )
00402                         {
00403                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00404                               
00405                               if( intval( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' ) ) % 2 == 1 )
00406                               {
00407                                     $Str = str_replace( 
00408                                           "{odd:$Parameters}" , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'content' ) , $Str 
00409                                     );
00410                               }
00411                               else
00412                               {
00413                                     $Str = str_replace( "{odd:$Parameters}" , '' , $Str );
00414                               }
00415                               
00416                               $Changed = true;
00417                         }
00418                         
00419                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00420                   }
00421                   catch( Exception $e )
00422                   {
00423                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00424                   }
00425             }

00509             function                process_if( $Str , $Changed )
00510             {
00511                   try
00512                   {
00513                         $Limitations = array( 'cond' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'condition' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00514                         
00515                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'if' , $Limitations ) ; )
00516                         {
00517                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00518                               
00519                               $Cond = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'condition' , false );
00520                               $Then = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'then' , '' );
00521                               $Else = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'else' , '' );
00522 
00523                               $Str = str_replace( "{if:$Parameters}" , $Cond == 0 ? $Else : $Then , $Str );
00524 
00525                               $Changed = true;
00526                         }
00527                         
00528                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00529                   }
00530                   catch( Exception $e )
00531                   {
00532                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00533                   }
00534             }

00562             function                process_map( $Str , $Changed )
00563             {
00564                   try
00565                   {
00566                         $Limitations = array( 
00567                               'first' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'second' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE
00568                         );
00569                         
00570                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'map' , $Limitations ) ; )
00571                         {
00572                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00573                               $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , false );
00574                               
00575                               $First = explode( '|' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'first' , '' ) );
00576                               $Second = explode( '|' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'second' , '' ) );
00577                               
00578                               $Template = '';
00579                               
00580                               foreach( $First as $k => $v )
00581                               {
00582                                     if( $v == $Value )
00583                                     {
00584                                           $Template = $Second[ $k ];
00585                                           break;
00586                                     }
00587                               }
00588                               
00589                               $Str = str_replace( "{map:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00590                               $Changed = true;
00591                         }
00592                         
00593                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00594                   }
00595                   catch( Exception $e )
00596                   {
00597                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00598                   }
00599             }
00600             
00631             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00632             {
00633                   try
00634                   {
00635                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_odd( $Str , $Changed );
00636                         
00637                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_even( $Str , $Changed );
00638                         
00639                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lte( $Str , $Changed );
00640                         
00641                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_gte( $Str , $Changed );
00642                         
00643                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_gt( $Str , $Changed );
00644                         
00645                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_lt( $Str , $Changed );
00646                         
00647                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_eq( $Str , $Changed );
00648                         
00649                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_neq( $Str , $Changed );
00650                         
00651                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_if( $Str , $Changed );
00652                         
00653                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_map( $Str , $Changed );
00654                         
00655                         return( $Str );
00656                   }
00657                   catch( Exception $e )
00658                   {
00659                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00660                   }
00661             }
